game.name: Max's Adventure
game.shortDescription: Max's Adventure is a fun 2D platformer where you guide Max, a playful dog, through fun levels full of obstacles and threats. Play as Max or his friends Cheddar and Brian, each with their own advantages and disadvantages.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Max's Adventure is a fun 2D platformer where you guide Max, a playful dog, through fun levels full of obstacles and threats. Play as Max or his friends Cheddar and Brian, each with their own advantages and disadvantages.
